content: finishing the body later then cut yarn 2 head 1st dpn pu 8 sts 1 for every other co st beg at 1st co st 14 k6 k7 ssk k1 k2tog k7 k6 2nd dpn pu 16 sts 1 for every co st 15 k all sts 3rd dpn pu 8 sts 1 for every other co st 16 k2tog k4 k6 ssk k1 k2tog k6 k4 ssk 1 k all sts 17 k all sts 2 k8 k4 *kfb k1* repeat 2 more times kfb k5 k8 18 k 5 k15 k4 k last st and 1st st of next round 3 k all sts together 4 k8 k7 *kfb k1* repeat kfb k8 k8 19-21 k all sts 5 k all sts at this point there should be 24 sts 4/15/5 6 k8 k10 kfb k1 kfb k10 k8 22 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round 7 k all sts 23 k all sts 8 k2tog k6 k10 ssk k1 k2tog k10 k6 ssk 24 *k2tog* repeat to end of round 9 k all sts 25 k all sts 10 k7 k9 ssk k1 k2tog k9 k7 cut yarn thread through remaining live sts and pull 11 k all sts tightly closed insert needle into center of nose and 12 k2tog k5 k8 ssk k1 k2tog k8 k5 ssk secure on inside of head use the long tail from pu 13 k all sts sts to darn hole between 1st and 3rd needle end of body and start of tail finishing tail after knitting the head stuff it firmly along with 2/3 of the body 1 k2tog k2tog k8 ssk ssk that that has already been knitted place live sts at end of body 2 k all sts back onto 3 dpns as follows 16 32 16 3 k2tog k2tog k4 ssk ssk 1 *k2 k2tog* repeat to end 4 k all sts 2 k all sts 5 k2tog k4 ssk 3 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end add small amount of stuffing to tail cut yarn and 4 k all sts thread through remaining live sts pull tightly closed 5 *k2tog* repeat to end insert needle down through center of tail and up 6 k all sts through work at spot where body and tail meet pull at this point there should be 16 sts cut brown yarn join white slightly to bend tail upwards secure yarn to yarn and k all sts for 1 inch stuff the rest of the body firmly underside through the open end of the tail yes you can 3 legs ears co 15 sts on 3 dpns 5 sts on each ndl k all sts for 3 inches co 9 sts on 3 dpns 3 sts on each needle 1 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end 1 k all sts 2 k all sts 2 * k1 kfb k1* repeat on each ndl k all sts for 1 inch 3 *k2tog* repeat to end 3 *k1 kfb k2* repeat on each ndl
